title: Overview
content: # What changed? * Add Osaka Jade theme to default collection by @Justikun * Add Style > Font as a walker interface in Omarchy menu rather than shelling out by @dhh * Add Style > Font changes will now be reflected in Waybar, SwayOSD, fontconfig as well by @dhh * Add Install > Editor section in Omarchy menu with common options for VSCode, Cursor, and Zed by @dhh * Add Install > Font with options for Meslo, Fira Code, Victor Code, Bitstream Vera common options by @dhh * Add Setup > Power Profiles to change powerprofilectl options via Omarchy menu by @dhh * Add transcode-video-1080p, transcode-video-4k, transcode-png2jpg functions for common media workflows by @dhh * Fix wrong workspace number descriptions in hyprland default binds by @pastr * Fix broken multicast dns config for printers by @oppegard * Fix that escaping out of Install > Package and Remove > Package shouldn't ask for sudo in Omarchy menu by @dhh * Fix the stuck Omarchy menu by upgrading to latest Walker and restarting the service by @dhh * Fix Remove > Theme selector wasn't working right by @gyllen + @xadcv * Fix screensaver should always use a black background and hide the cursor by @manuel1618 ### New Osaka Jade theme ![osaka-jade-theme](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/0bd11127-47ff-413a-bd2e-fecf8fe64c8e) ### Install > Editor ### Style > Font

title: New Contributors
content:
* @Justikun made their first contribution in https://github.com/basecamp/omarchy/pull/514
* @xadcv made their first contribution in https://github.com/basecamp/omarchy/pull/505
* @pastr made their first contribution in https://github.com/basecamp/omarchy/pull/522
* @oppegard made their first contribution in https://github.com/basecamp/omarchy/pull/521
* @manuel1618 made their first contribution in https://github.com/basecamp/omarchy/pull/526
* @gyllen made their first contribution in https://github.com/basecamp/omarchy/pull/533

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/basecamp/omarchy/compare/v1.11.0...v1.12.0
